substeps.text: Gather all your ingredients.

steps.text: Cook sausage, ground beef, onion, and garlic in a Dutch oven over medium heat until well browned.

substeps.text: Cook sausage, ground beef, onion, and garlic in a Dutch oven over medium heat until well browned.

steps.text: Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato sauce, tomato paste, and water. Season with sugar, 2 tablespoons parsley, basil, 1 teaspoon salt, Italian seasoning, fennel seeds, and pepper. Simmer, covered, for about 1 ½ hours, stirring occasionally.

substeps.text: Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato sauce, tomato paste, and water.
Season with sugar, 2 tablespoons parsley, basil, 1 teaspoon salt, Italian seasoning, fennel seeds, and pepper.
Simmer, covered, for about 1 ½ hours, stirring occasionally.

steps.text: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook lasagna noodles in boiling water for 8 to 10 minutes. Drain noodles, and rinse with cold water.

substeps.text: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
Cook lasagna noodles in boiling water for 8 to 10 minutes.
Drain noodles, and rinse with cold water.

steps.text: In a mixing bowl, combine ricotta cheese with egg, remaining 2 tablespoons parsley, and 1/2 teaspoon salt.

substeps.text: In a mixing bowl, combine ricotta cheese with egg, remaining 2 tablespoons parsley, and 1/2 teaspoon salt.

steps.text: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

substeps.text: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

steps.text: To assemble, spread 1 ½ cups of meat sauce in the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish. Arrange 6 noodles lengthwise over meat sauce, overlapping slightly. Spread with 1/2 of the ricotta cheese mixture. Top with 1/3 of the mozzarella cheese slices. Spoon 1 ½ cups meat sauce over mozzarella, and sprinkle with 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese.

substeps.text: To assemble, spread 1 ½ cups of meat sauce in the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish.
Arrange 6 noodles lengthwise over meat sauce, overlapping slightly.
Spread with 1/2 of the ricotta cheese mixture.
Top with 1/3 of the mozzarella cheese slices.
Spoon 1 ½ cups meat sauce over mozzarella, and sprinkle with 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese.

steps.text: Repeat layers, and top with remaining mozzarella and Parmesan cheese. Cover with foil: to prevent sticking, either spray foil with cooking spray or make sure the foil does not touch the cheese.

substeps.text: Repeat layers, and top with remaining mozzarella and Parmesan cheese.
Cover with foil: to prevent sticking, either spray foil with cooking spray or make sure the foil does not touch the cheese.

steps.text: Bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes. Remove the foil and bake for an additional 25 minutes.

substeps.text: Bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes.
Remove the foil and bake for an additional 25 minutes.

steps.text: Rest lasagna for 15 minutes before serving.

substeps.text: Rest lasagna for 15 minutes before serving.
